name: Karma The Chameleon
description:
Karma the Chameleon

Karma the chameleon was a game created by:

James Jek ( Art and Programming )

Martin Perina ( Programming )

Nick Pastoria ( Music, Sound, Programming )

Karma the Chameleon was created for UCSC's CMPM/ARTG 120 "Endless Runner Project" during spring of 2022. The game was made over the course of two weeks.
